live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45350.summary: Some customers in Salmon Arm are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45350.title: Dec 26 - Salmon Arm | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Technicians are ready to restore services once hydro power to our equipment is working again.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
